parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3 </value></part><part><name/>=<value> Game

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.56</value></part><part><name>Game Version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Menu </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns shortcut related to menu entry on given path. Returns the shortcut in form of a bitflag. To get the shortcut text use [[menuShortcutText]] command. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[menuShortcut]] [idc, path] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> path: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> control [[menuShortcut]] path </value></part><part><name>Alternative Syntax</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> control: [[Control]] </value></part><part><name>Alternative Parameter 1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> path: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>Alternative Parameter 2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value>  [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>Alternative Return Value</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value>  <Code>[[findDisplay]] 313 [[displayCtrl]] 120 [[menuShortcut]] [0, 1];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[menuShortcutText]] [[menuSetURL]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
</value></part></template></root>
